name: @shieldbattery/windows-registry
description: A Rust/neon-based node.js native module for accessing and modifying the Windows registry.

scripts.build: cd native && cargo-cp-artifact -nc index.node -- cargo build --target=x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --message-format=json-render-diagnostics
scripts.test: cd native && cargo test && cd .. && pnpm run build && node --test

author: Travis Collins <travis@tec27.com> (http://tec27.com)
